record.id: field.name="service.name" and file.name="extaccess" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: service.name
record.file.name: extaccess

brief.brief: The name of the Web service you want to use to publish the Service Manager table.
You can reuse the same Web service name to publish multiple tables, but you can only publish a table as part of one Web service at time.
Since this name becomes part of a URL, the name must consist of alphanumeric characters valid for URLs. The name cannot consist of URL reserved characters such as spaces, slashes, or colons.

detail.detail: The name you type for this field becomes the alias name for service and becomes part of the Web service URL. For example, if you type IncidentManagement for the service name, then SOAP applications must include IncidentManagement.wsdl in the URL to access this service.
